definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

sentences.english: Much clearer is the characteristic these explanations have in common.
sentences.chinese: 明顯得多得是這些解釋的共同特徵。

sentences.english: There is no shortage of studies on green jobs that support this optimistic view.
sentences.chinese: 全世界多得是支持這種樂觀看法的綠色工作研究。
